title: Garage Talk 4
description: We're on the outskirts of technology out here in the garage, which is 50% Wi-Fi deadzone and 50% a reminder that streaming on a MacBook Air is going to probably desync your audio and video. But between the Zaxxon iron-ons and Jeff's 1996 offer letter, there's a little something for everyone out in the garage.

description: Jeff Gerstmann's mystery microwave... revealed!

description: We scrum up and try to score some trys with grubbers. Good thing our rucks game is so solid.

description: I don't know what crime brought us to this prison but it's nothing a sock, some soap, and an immunity to death can't overcome.

description: Gwa gua goo-ah, gooAH. Gua GWWWAAAAA goa-goa gwa!

description: It's one step back, two steps forward in this electrifying episode.

title: Vinny Caravella - A Far Cry from Home (01/23/2015)
GB Crime Crew: Episode 00
description: Hop in with the Beast Crew as they talk you through their new GTA Online feature and do the first heist setup.

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 01
description: The Beast Crew are diving in and getting their feet wet with their first heist set up! Everything goes smoothly and as planned, of course!

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 02
description: Half of the Crime Crew take to the air as the other half go to prison. Will their first heist be a success?

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 03
description: We begin our second heist and as the money goes up so does the tension as mistakes and murder enter the equation.

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 04
description: The well-oiled machine of the Crime Crew has to work together to decipher the mechanics of our new stealth mission.

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 05
description: It's time for the heist! We've got helicopters, night vision, and ourselves to contend with. Time to go to work.

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 06
description: There is so much and so little happening in this episode. It's one of my favorites and the one I was most frustrated with. I hope you enjoy it... or hate it as much as I do.

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 07
description: It's time to take out the trash! And if we don't get it right on the first try, well, there's always the fourth!

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 08
description: The Crime Crew encounters new and unexpected levels of obscurity as they try to complete their latest mission.

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 09
description: It's time to wrap up our final mission in this heist and say goodbye to Trevor and his friends. Which is fine, they have other stuff going on and we have other stuff going on... it's fine.

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 10
description: The Crime Crew returns to begin another heist, this time involving simultaneous crime navigating and then land and sea traversal!

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 11
description: The mission so nice we do it twice! Not because we have to but because it's the Crime Crew and we're amazing.

title: GB Crime Crew: Episode 12
description: This is it! It's the finale. Join us as we put all our skills to the test and succeed in crimes with no problems whatsoever.

title: Steal My Sunshine: Episode 05

description: Pachinko.

title: Steal My Sunshine: Episode 10
description: Yoshi plays by his own rules. And those rules are bad.

description: When the pendulum of fortune swings one way, eventually it must swing back...

title: Steal My Sunshine: Episode 12
description: What comes first: the yoshi or the egg?

title: Steal My Sunshine: Episode 15
